list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a length or square of fabric worn around the neck or head.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she tucked her woolly scarf around her neck
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô nhét chiếc khăn len của mình quanh cổ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a joint connecting two pieces of timber or metal in which the ends are beveled or notched so that they fit over or into each other.
an incision made in the blubber of a whale.
join the ends of (two pieces of timber or metal) by beveling or notching them so that they fit over or into each other.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he forced me to scarf the keel timbers in watertight sections
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta buộc tôi phải quàng cổ keel timbers trong phần kín nước

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make an incision in the blubber of (a whale).
